info.title: Fake Store API
info.description: This API simulates a fake store experience. It offers endpoints to list available store items and to purchase a specific item. The detailed metadata is tailored for LLM agentic orchestration through semantic Swagger docs.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available items in the fake store. Each item includes its unique ID, name, description, price, and applicable tax.

schema.title: Response List Store Items Store Items Get

post.description: Place a purchase order for a specific store item. Provide the product ID, buyer name, and desired quantity. On successful processing, the endpoint returns an order confirmation with detailed purchase information.

product_id.title: Product ID
product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product to purchase.

buyer_name.title: Buyer Name
buyer_name.description: The name of the customer placing the order.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of units to purchase. Defaults to 1.

id.title: Product ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the store product.

description.title: Product Description
description.description: Detailed description of the product, including its features.

price.title: Product Price
price.description: The selling price of the product.

tax.title: Applicable Tax
tax.description: Optional tax applied to the product's price.
